general.gigTitle: develop a wordpress website with elementor pro or convert design into HTML CSS

sellerCard.oneLiner: UIUX Designer, Graphic Designer, Motion Designer
sellerCard.description:
Hi, my name is Vlad. I am a designer from Ukraine with 12 years of experience.
Iâ€™ve carried out over 1000 projects, from creating logos to creating big websites and web systems. Cooperated with clients all over the world. So, experience allows me to complete projects of high importance and now I want to solve problems for you. And I think my experience will bring a new view to your company.

description.content:
Please, contact me before placing your order, as every project is unique and should be estimated personally.

  

About Me.

My name is Vlad. I have over 6 years of experience working with HTML/CSS/JS, and WordPress. I can do awesome, responsive, professional & eye-catching websites.


Services I provide:

  1. Converting a web page design into a fully responsive website (HTML/CSS/JS).
  2. Integration of ready-made markup into WordPress.
  3. Creating a WordPress website using the Elementor Pro plugin.


What you will get:

  • Easy Navigation
  • Responsive and Browser Compatible
  • Ready to Generate Leads
  • Highly Secure and SSL
  • Fast Loading Speed
  • SEO Friendly
  • Fully featured Content Management System


For any questions feel free to contact me here.
